fullForm: Aligarh Muslim University Engineering Entrance Examination

applicationFees.general: INR 650 (B.Tech), INR 750 (B.Arch and B.Tech), INR 450 (B.E. evening)
applicationFees.obc: INR 650 (B.Tech), INR 750 (B.Arch and B.Tech), INR 450 (B.E. evening)
applicationFees.sc_st: INR 650 (B.Tech), INR 750 (B.Arch and B.Tech), INR 450 (B.E. evening)

eligibility: Candidates must have passed Class 12 or equivalent examination with Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, and English with at least 50% aggregate marks.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility criteria for AMUEEE?
faqs.answer: Candidates must have passed Class 12 or equivalent with Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, and English, securing at least 50% aggregate marks.
